channel.title: Updates: Student Loan Data Documentation [Records Request]
channel.description: Updates on the Data Liberation Project's Student Loan Data Documentation request

item.title: 20-Day Notification
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On October 31, 2022, the Department of Education emailed a 20-day-notification letter üìÑ regarding this request, noting that ‚Äúwe are unable to provide an estimated completion date, but intend to provide records on a rolling basis as they become available.‚Äù

item.title: Request Acknowledged, Fee Waiver Granted
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On September 29, 2022, the Department of Education emailed an acknowledgment letter üìÑ regarding this request and has granted the Data Liberation Project a fee waiver: “You have asked for a waiver of all fees, including duplication fees, associated with processing your request based on your requester category as News Media requester. Based on the information you submitted for a fee waiver, that request is granted.”
